title: ranked
body: why do i have a loss in my ranked promos even though i haven't losses any games in my promo

replies.body: Did you happen to queue dodge during your promos?  Queue dodges while in promos will count as 1 loss towards the series.
Nothing to do with the thread.

ok can we pls make a better system for ranked first. I miss be able to play with any number of friends y does it have to be just duo que, I'm tired of brain dead people who jus simply cant be carried with just 2 people. second can we please make a system where people have to like take a test or something in order to play ranked to just test ur freakin intelligence pls. 3rd we need a system in which we can play with people who r near our rank people who r in silver should never play with gold they r clearly better then silver. pls make ranked better. srry for the flame holy.....
